name: Builder (JW)
description:
Game by me and just me. Nobody else other than me. The collision code was totally definitely NOT made by somebody called "Thesamman".

CTRL- and Q- click to move items around
E to toggle inventory
WSAD, SPACE to move
N to generate a new world
SHIFT to run
Left click to place blocks, right click to place walls. The pickaxe removes blocks, the axe removes walls.
